name: Information Exchange Package Documentation
summary: An IEPD file is an Information Exchange Package Documentation file. It contains a set of artifacts related to standards and information exchange specifications. IEPD files are renamed .ZIP fils, and so can be opened with any Zip-decompression utility.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .iepd to .zip ; open as you would any ZIP file
